channel.title: CVE Feed for Openshift Enterprise -- unsanitized paths in tar.go
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Openshift Enterprise -- unsanitized paths in tar.go

item.title: CVE-2018-1103|2024-08-05T03:51:48.543Z -- openshift%20enterprise -- unsanitized%20paths%20in%20tar.go
item.description: Openshift Enterprise source-to-image before version 1.1.10 is vulnerable to an improper validation of user input. An attacker who could trick a user into using the command to copy files locally, from a pod, could override files outside of the target directory of the command.
